services.name: AWS Lambda
services.documentation: AWS Lambda lets you run code without provisioning or managing servers. You pay only for the compute time you consume. Lambda automatically scales your application by running code in response to triggers.
services.billingModel: Pay per request and compute duration

services.name: Amazon EC2
services.documentation: Amazon EC2 provides resizable compute capacity in the cloud. It allows you to launch virtual servers, configure security and networking, and manage storage. EC2 offers various instance types optimized for different use cases.
services.billingModel: Pay per hour or second of instance usage

services.name: Amazon S3
services.documentation: Amazon S3 is object storage built to store and retrieve any amount of data. It offers industry-leading durability, availability, performance, security, and virtually unlimited scalability at very low costs.

services.name: Amazon DynamoDB
services.documentation: Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service that provides fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability. It supports both document and key-value data models.
services.billingModel: Pay per read/write capacity units or on-demand
services.costHint: On-demand: $1.25 per million write units, $0.25 per million read units

services.name: Amazon API Gateway
services.documentation: Amazon API Gateway is a fully managed service for creating, publishing, maintaining, monitoring, and securing REST, HTTP, and WebSocket APIs. It handles traffic management, authorization, and API versioning.
services.billingModel: Pay per API call + data transfer

services.name: Amazon CloudFront
services.documentation: Amazon CloudFront is a fast content delivery network (CDN) service that securely delivers data, videos, applications, and APIs to customers globally with low latency and high transfer speeds.

services.name: Amazon RDS
services.documentation: Amazon RDS makes it easy to set up, operate, and scale a relational database in the cloud. It supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, Oracle, and SQL Server with automated backups and patching.

services.name: Amazon Cognito
services.documentation: Amazon Cognito provides authentication, authorization, and user management for web and mobile apps. Users can sign in directly with a username and password or through third parties like Facebook, Google, or Amazon.

services.name: Amazon SQS
services.documentation: Amazon SQS is a fully managed message queuing service that enables you to decouple and scale microservices, distributed systems, and serverless applications.

services.name: Amazon SNS
services.documentation: Amazon SNS is a fully managed pub/sub messaging service for application-to-application and application-to-person communication. It supports SMS, email, and push notifications.
services.costHint: ~$0.50 per million publishes, SMS varies by country

services.name: Amazon EventBridge
services.shortDescription: Serverless event bus for application integration
services.documentation: Amazon EventBridge is a serverless event bus that connects applications using events from AWS services, SaaS apps, and custom sources.

services.name: Amazon Kinesis
services.documentation: Amazon Kinesis makes it easy to collect, process, and analyze real-time streaming data for timely insights.

services.name: Amazon Athena
services.documentation: Amazon Athena is an interactive query service that makes it easy to analyze data in S3 using standard SQL.

services.name: Amazon Rekognition
services.documentation: Amazon Rekognition makes it easy to add image and video analysis to your applications using deep learning.

services.name: Amazon Bedrock
services.documentation: Amazon Bedrock is a fully managed service offering foundation models from leading AI companies via a single API.

services.name: Amazon SageMaker
services.shortDescription: Build, train, and deploy ML models
services.documentation: Amazon SageMaker is a fully managed service to build, train, and deploy machine learning models at scale.

services.name: Amazon ECS
services.documentation: Amazon ECS is a fully managed container orchestration service for running Docker containers.
services.billingModel: Pay for underlying EC2 or Fargate

services.name: AWS Fargate
services.documentation: AWS Fargate is a serverless compute engine for containers that works with ECS and EKS.
services.billingModel: Pay per vCPU and memory per second

services.name: Amazon ECR
services.documentation: Amazon ECR is a fully managed Docker container registry for storing, managing, and deploying container images.
services.billingModel: Pay per GB stored + data transfer

services.name: Amazon EKS
services.documentation: Amazon EKS is a managed Kubernetes service to run Kubernetes on AWS without managing the control plane.

services.name: Elastic Load Balancing
services.documentation: Elastic Load Balancing automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets.

services.name: Amazon Route 53
services.documentation: Amazon Route 53 is a highly available and scalable DNS web service for domain registration and routing.

services.name: Amazon VPC
services.documentation: Amazon VPC lets you provision a logically isolated section of the AWS Cloud with your own virtual network.

services.name: AWS IAM
services.documentation: AWS IAM enables you to manage access to AWS services and resources securely with users, groups, and roles.

services.name: AWS KMS
services.documentation: AWS KMS makes it easy to create and manage cryptographic keys for encrypting your data.

services.name: AWS WAF
services.documentation: AWS WAF is a web application firewall that helps protect your web applications from common exploits.
services.billingModel: Pay per web ACL + rules + requests

services.name: AWS Secrets Manager
services.documentation: AWS Secrets Manager helps you protect secrets needed to access your applications, services, and IT resources.

services.name: Amazon CloudWatch
services.documentation: Amazon CloudWatch monitors your AWS resources and applications, collecting metrics, logs, and events.

services.name: AWS CodePipeline
services.documentation: AWS CodePipeline is a continuous delivery service for fast and reliable application updates.

services.name: AWS CodeBuild
services.documentation: AWS CodeBuild is a fully managed build service that compiles source code, runs tests, and produces packages.

services.name: AWS CloudFormation
services.documentation: AWS CloudFormation lets you model and provision AWS resources using templates.

services.name: AWS Step Functions
services.documentation: AWS Step Functions lets you coordinate multiple AWS services into serverless workflows.

services.name: AWS Glue
services.documentation: AWS Glue is a serverless data integration service for discovering, preparing, and combining data.

services.name: Amazon Redshift
services.documentation: Amazon Redshift is a fast, scalable data warehouse for analyzing data across your data warehouse and data lake.

services.name: Amazon QuickSight
services.documentation: Amazon QuickSight is a fast, cloud-powered business intelligence service for building visualizations and dashboards.

services.name: Amazon EBS
services.documentation: Amazon EBS provides persistent block storage volumes for use with EC2 instances.

services.name: Amazon EFS
services.documentation: Amazon EFS provides a simple, scalable, elastic file system for Linux-based workloads.

services.name: Amazon S3 Glacier
services.documentation: Amazon S3 Glacier is a secure, durable, and low-cost storage class for data archiving and long-term backup.

services.name: AWS Amplify
services.shortDescription: Build full-stack web and mobile apps
services.documentation: AWS Amplify is a set of tools and services for building scalable full-stack web and mobile applications.

services.name: AWS AppSync
services.documentation: AWS AppSync is a managed GraphQL service for building data-driven apps with real-time and offline capabilities.

services.name: AWS IoT Core
services.shortDescription: Connect IoT devices to the cloud
services.documentation: AWS IoT Core lets you connect IoT devices to AWS services without managing servers.

services.name: Amazon Connect
services.documentation: Amazon Connect is an easy-to-use cloud contact center service for customer engagement.

services.name: Amazon Lex
services.documentation: Amazon Lex provides advanced deep learning for building conversational interfaces using voice and text.

services.name: Amazon Polly
services.documentation: Amazon Polly turns text into lifelike speech, allowing you to create applications that talk.

services.name: Amazon Transcribe
services.documentation: Amazon Transcribe is an automatic speech recognition service for adding speech-to-text capability.

services.name: Amazon Comprehend
services.documentation: Amazon Comprehend is a natural language processing service for finding insights and relationships in text.

services.name: Amazon Translate
services.documentation: Amazon Translate is a neural machine translation service for fast, high-quality language translation.

services.name: Amazon Textract
services.documentation: Amazon Textract automatically extracts text, handwriting, and data from scanned documents.

services.name: Amazon Personalize
services.documentation: Amazon Personalize enables developers to build applications with real-time personalized recommendations.

services.name: Amazon Forecast
services.documentation: Amazon Forecast is a fully managed service for accurate time-series forecasting using machine learning.

services.name: AWS Auto Scaling
services.documentation: AWS Auto Scaling monitors your applications and automatically adjusts capacity to maintain performance.
services.costHint: No charge for Auto Scaling itself

services.name: Amazon ElastiCache
services.documentation: Amazon ElastiCache is a fully managed in-memory caching service supporting Redis and Memcached.

services.name: Amazon DocumentDB
services.documentation: Amazon DocumentDB is a fast, scalable, highly available MongoDB-compatible document database service.
services.billingModel: Pay per instance hour + storage + I/O

services.name: Amazon Neptune
services.documentation: Amazon Neptune is a fast, reliable, fully managed graph database service for highly connected datasets.
services.billingModel: Pay per instance hour + storage + I/O

services.name: Amazon Timestream
services.documentation: Amazon Timestream is a fast, scalable, serverless time series database for IoT and operational applications.

services.name: Amazon MSK
services.documentation: Amazon MSK is a fully managed service for Apache Kafka to build and run streaming data applications.

services.name: Amazon OpenSearch
services.documentation: Amazon OpenSearch Service makes it easy to deploy, operate, and scale OpenSearch for log analytics and search.

services.name: AWS DMS
services.documentation: AWS Database Migration Service helps you migrate databases to AWS quickly and securely.

services.name: AWS Snowball
services.documentation: AWS Snowball is a petabyte-scale data transport solution using physical storage devices.

services.name: Amazon WorkSpaces
services.documentation: Amazon WorkSpaces is a managed desktop computing service for provisioning cloud-based desktops.

services.name: Amazon Chime
services.documentation: Amazon Chime is a communications service for online meetings, video conferencing, and business calling.

services.name: AWS Elemental MediaLive
services.documentation: AWS Elemental MediaLive is a broadcast-grade live video processing service for creating high-quality video streams.

services.name: Amazon Managed Blockchain
services.documentation: Amazon Managed Blockchain is a fully managed service for creating and managing blockchain networks.

services.name: Amazon Braket
services.documentation: Amazon Braket is a fully managed quantum computing service for researchers and developers.

services.name: AWS Batch
services.documentation: AWS Batch enables you to run batch computing workloads on AWS.

services.name: Amazon Lightsail
services.documentation: Amazon Lightsail is designed to be the easiest way to launch and manage a virtual private server.

services.name: Amazon SES
services.documentation: Amazon SES is a cloud-based email sending service designed to help digital marketers and application developers send marketing, notification, and transactional emails.

services.name: Amazon WorkMail
services.documentation: Amazon WorkMail is a secure, managed business email and calendaring service with support for existing desktop and mobile email clients.

services.name: Amazon WorkDocs
services.documentation: Amazon WorkDocs is a fully managed, secure content creation, storage, and collaboration service.
services.billingModel: Pay per active user per month

services.name: Amazon AppStream 2.0
services.documentation: Amazon AppStream 2.0 is a fully managed application streaming service that provides users instant access to their desktop applications from anywhere.

services.name: Amazon GameLift
services.documentation: Amazon GameLift is a managed service for deploying, operating, and scaling dedicated game servers for session-based multiplayer games.

services.name: Amazon Detective
services.documentation: Amazon Detective makes it easy to analyze, investigate, and quickly identify the root cause of potential security issues or suspicious activities.

services.name: Amazon GuardDuty
services.documentation: Amazon GuardDuty is a threat detection service that continuously monitors for malicious activity and unauthorized behavior.

services.name: Amazon Macie
services.documentation: Amazon Macie is a fully managed data security and data privacy service that uses machine learning and pattern matching to discover and protect your sensitive data in AWS.

services.name: Amazon Inspector
services.documentation: Amazon Inspector is an automated security assessment service that helps improve the security and compliance of applications deployed on AWS.

services.name: AWS Certificate Manager
services.documentation: AWS Certificate Manager is a service that lets you easily provision, manage, and deploy public and private Secure Sockets Layer/Transport Layer Security (SSL/TLS) certificates.

services.name: AWS Directory Service
services.documentation: AWS Directory Service for Microsoft Active Directory, also known as AWS Managed Microsoft AD, enables your directory-aware workloads and AWS resources to use managed Active Directory in the AWS Cloud.

services.name: AWS Organizations
services.documentation: AWS Organizations helps you centrally govern your environment as you grow and scale your workloads on AWS.
services.costHint: No additional charge for AWS Organizations

services.name: AWS Config
services.documentation: AWS Config is a service that enables you to assess, audit, and evaluate the configurations of your AWS resources.

services.name: AWS Systems Manager
services.documentation: AWS Systems Manager gives you visibility and control of your infrastructure on AWS.

services.name: AWS CloudTrail
services.documentation: AWS CloudTrail is a service that enables governance, compliance, operational auditing, and risk auditing of your AWS account.

services.name: AWS Trusted Advisor
services.documentation: AWS Trusted Advisor provides recommendations that help you follow AWS best practices.

services.name: AWS Support
services.documentation: AWS Support offers a range of plans that provide access to tools and expertise that support the success and operational health of your AWS solutions.

services.name: AWS Well-Architected Tool
services.documentation: The AWS Well-Architected Tool helps you review the state of your workloads and compares them to the latest AWS architectural best practices.

services.name: AWS Cost Explorer
services.documentation: AWS Cost Explorer has an easy-to-use interface that lets you visualize, understand, and manage your AWS costs and usage over time.

services.name: AWS Budgets
services.documentation: AWS Budgets gives you the ability to set custom budgets that alert you when your costs or usage exceed (or are forecasted to exceed) your budgeted amount.

services.documentation: Amazon SES is a cloud-based email sending service designed to help digital marketers and application developers send marketing, notification, and transactional emails.

services.name: AWS Well-Architected Tool

services.name: AWS Cost Explorer
services.documentation: AWS Cost Explorer has an easy-to-use interface that lets you visualize, understand, and manage your AWS costs and usage over time.

services.name: AWS Budgets
services.documentation: AWS Budgets gives you the ability to set custom budgets that alert you when your costs or usage exceed (or are forecasted to exceed) your budgeted amount.

services.name: Amazon EMR
services.documentation: Amazon EMR is a cloud big data platform for processing vast amounts of data using open source tools.

services.name: AWS Data Pipeline
services.documentation: AWS Data Pipeline is a web service that helps you reliably process and move data between different AWS compute and storage services.

services.name: AWS Lake Formation
services.documentation: AWS Lake Formation makes it easy to set up a secure data lake in days.

services.name: Amazon Elasticsearch Service
services.documentation: Amazon Elasticsearch Service is a fully managed service that makes it easy to deploy, secure, and run Elasticsearch cost effectively at scale.

services.name: Amazon CloudSearch
services.documentation: Amazon CloudSearch is a managed service in the AWS Cloud that makes it simple and cost-effective to set up, manage, and scale a search solution for your website or application.

services.name: Amazon Kendra
services.documentation: Amazon Kendra is a highly accurate and easy to use enterprise search service that's powered by machine learning.

services.name: Amazon Lookout for Vision
services.shortDescription: Spot product defects using computer vision
services.documentation: Amazon Lookout for Vision is a machine learning service that spots defects and anomalies in visual representations using computer vision.

services.name: Amazon Lookout for Metrics
services.documentation: Amazon Lookout for Metrics uses machine learning to detect anomalies in your metrics and help diagnose their root cause.

services.name: Amazon Lookout for Equipment
services.documentation: Amazon Lookout for Equipment detects abnormal equipment behavior by analyzing the data from your sensors.

services.name: Amazon Fraud Detector
services.documentation: Amazon Fraud Detector is a fully managed service that uses machine learning to identify potentially fraudulent activities.

services.name: Amazon CodeGuru
services.documentation: Amazon CodeGuru is a developer tool that provides intelligent recommendations to improve code quality and identify an application's most expensive lines of code.

services.name: AWS X-Ray
services.documentation: AWS X-Ray helps developers analyze and debug production, distributed applications.

services.name: AWS App Mesh
services.documentation: AWS App Mesh is a service mesh that provides application-level networking to make it easy for your services to communicate with each other.

services.name: AWS Cloud Map
services.documentation: AWS Cloud Map is a cloud resource discovery service that allows you to register any application resources and dynamically discover them.

services.name: AWS Global Accelerator
services.documentation: AWS Global Accelerator is a service that improves the availability and performance of your applications with local or global users.

services.name: AWS Transit Gateway
services.documentation: AWS Transit Gateway connects VPCs and on-premises networks through a central hub.

services.name: AWS Direct Connect
services.documentation: AWS Direct Connect is a cloud service solution that makes it easy to establish a dedicated network connection from your premises to AWS.

services.name: AWS Client VPN
services.documentation: AWS Client VPN is a managed client-based VPN service that enables you to securely access your AWS resources and resources in your on-premises network.

services.name: AWS Site-to-Site VPN
services.documentation: AWS Site-to-Site VPN creates encrypted tunnels between your network and your Amazon Virtual Private Clouds or AWS Transit Gateways.

services.name: AWS PrivateLink
services.documentation: AWS PrivateLink provides private connectivity between VPCs, AWS services, and on-premises applications, securely on the Amazon network.

services.name: AWS Backup
services.documentation: AWS Backup is a centralized backup service that makes it easy and cost-effective to backup your application data across AWS services.

services.name: AWS Storage Gateway
services.documentation: AWS Storage Gateway connects an on-premises software appliance with cloud-based storage to provide seamless integration.

services.name: Amazon FSx
services.documentation: Amazon FSx makes it easy and cost effective to launch and run popular file systems.

services.name: AWS DataSync
services.documentation: AWS DataSync makes it simple and fast to move large amounts of data online between on-premises storage and Amazon S3, Amazon EFS, or Amazon FSx.

services.name: AWS Migration Hub
services.documentation: AWS Migration Hub provides a single location to track the progress of application migrations across multiple AWS and partner solutions.

services.name: AWS Server Migration Service
services.documentation: AWS Server Migration Service (SMS) is an agentless service which makes it easier and faster to migrate thousands of on-premises workloads to AWS.

services.name: AWS Application Discovery Service
services.documentation: AWS Application Discovery Service helps enterprise customers plan migration projects by gathering information about their on-premises data centers.
services.costHint: No charge for Application Discovery Service

services.name: AWS Application Migration Service
services.documentation: AWS Application Migration Service minimizes time-intensive, error-prone manual processes by automatically converting your source servers to run natively on AWS.

services.name: AWS IoT Analytics
services.documentation: AWS IoT Analytics is a fully-managed service that makes it easy to run and operationalize sophisticated analytics on massive volumes of IoT data.

services.name: AWS IoT Device Management
services.documentation: AWS IoT Device Management makes it easy to securely register, organize, monitor, and remotely manage IoT devices at scale.

services.name: AWS IoT Events
services.documentation: AWS IoT Events is a fully managed service that makes it easy to detect and respond to events from IoT sensors and applications.

services.name: AWS IoT SiteWise
services.documentation: AWS IoT SiteWise is a managed service that makes it easy to collect, store, organize and monitor data from industrial equipment at scale.

services.name: AWS IoT Things Graph
services.documentation: AWS IoT Things Graph is a service that makes it easy to visually connect different devices and web services to build IoT applications.

services.name: AWS IoT Greengrass
services.documentation: AWS IoT Greengrass seamlessly extends AWS onto physical devices so they can act locally on the data they generate, while still using the cloud for management, analytics, and durable storage.

services.name: AWS IoT Device Defender
services.documentation: AWS IoT Device Defender is a fully managed service that helps you secure your fleet of IoT devices.

services.name: AWS IoT 1-Click
services.documentation: AWS IoT 1-Click is a service that enables simple devices to trigger AWS Lambda functions that can execute an action.

services.name: AWS RoboMaker
services.documentation: AWS RoboMaker is a service that makes it easy to develop, simulate, and deploy intelligent robotics applications at scale.

services.name: AWS Ground Station
services.documentation: AWS Ground Station is a fully managed service that lets you control satellite communications, process data, and scale your operations without having to worry about building or managing your own ground station infrastructure.
services.billingModel: Pay per minute of antenna time

services.name: AWS Outposts
services.documentation: AWS Outposts is a fully managed service that offers the same AWS infrastructure, AWS services, APIs, and tools to virtually any datacenter, co-location space, or on-premises facility.

services.name: Amazon SES
services.documentation: Amazon SES is a cloud-based email sending service designed to help digital marketers and application developers send marketing, notification, and transactional emails.

services.documentation: Amazon WorkMail is a secure, managed business email and calendaring service with support for existing desktop and mobile email clients.

services.documentation: AWS IoT Things Graph is a service that makes it easy to visually connect different devices and web services to build IoT applications.

services.name: AWS IoT Greengrass
services.documentation: AWS IoT Greengrass seamlessly extends AWS onto physical devices so they can act locally on the data they generate, while still using the cloud for management, analytics, and durable storage.

services.name: AWS IoT Device Defender
services.documentation: AWS IoT Device Defender is a fully managed service that helps you secure your fleet of IoT devices.

services.name: AWS IoT 1-Click
services.documentation: AWS IoT 1-Click is a service that enables simple devices to trigger AWS Lambda functions that can execute an action.

services.name: AWS RoboMaker
services.documentation: AWS RoboMaker is a service that makes it easy to develop, simulate, and deploy intelligent robotics applications at scale.

services.name: AWS Ground Station
services.documentation: AWS Ground Station is a fully managed service that lets you control satellite communications, process data, and scale your operations without having to worry about building or managing your own ground station infrastructure.
services.billingModel: Pay per minute of antenna time

services.name: AWS Outposts
services.documentation: AWS Outposts is a fully managed service that offers the same AWS infrastructure, AWS services, APIs, and tools to virtually any datacenter, co-location space, or on-premises facility.

services.name: AWS Elemental MediaConnect
services.documentation: AWS Elemental MediaConnect is a high-quality transport service for live video.

services.name: AWS Elemental MediaConvert
services.documentation: AWS Elemental MediaConvert is a file-based video transcoding service with broadcast-grade features.

services.name: AWS Elemental MediaPackage
services.documentation: AWS Elemental MediaPackage reliably prepares and protects your video for delivery over the Internet.

services.name: AWS Elemental MediaStore
services.documentation: AWS Elemental MediaStore is an AWS storage service optimized for media.

services.name: AWS Elemental MediaTailor
services.documentation: AWS Elemental MediaTailor is a channel assembly and personalized ad-insertion service for video providers.

services.name: Amazon Interactive Video Service
services.documentation: Amazon Interactive Video Service (Amazon IVS) is a managed live streaming solution that is quick and easy to set up.

services.name: Amazon Nimble Studio
services.documentation: Amazon Nimble Studio empowers creative studios to produce visual effects, animation, and interactive content entirely in the cloud.

services.name: Amazon Kinesis Video Streams
services.documentation: Amazon Kinesis Video Streams makes it easy to securely stream video from connected devices to AWS for analytics, machine learning, and other processing.

services.name: Amazon Managed Grafana
services.documentation: Amazon Managed Grafana is a fully managed service for Grafana, a popular open-source analytics platform.

services.name: Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus
services.documentation: Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus is a serverless, Prometheus-compatible monitoring service for container metrics.

services.name: AWS Proton
services.documentation: AWS Proton is the first fully managed application delivery service for container and serverless applications.

services.name: AWS CodeStar
services.documentation: AWS CodeStar enables you to quickly develop, build, and deploy applications on AWS.

services.name: AWS CodeCommit
services.documentation: AWS CodeCommit is a fully-managed source control service that hosts secure Git-based repositories.

services.name: AWS CodeDeploy
services.documentation: AWS CodeDeploy is a deployment service that automates application deployments to Amazon EC2 instances, on-premises instances, or serverless Lambda functions.

services.name: AWS Cloud9
services.documentation: AWS Cloud9 is a cloud-based integrated development environment (IDE) that lets you write, run, and debug your code with just a browser.

services.name: AWS Device Farm
services.documentation: AWS Device Farm is an application testing service that lets you improve the quality of your web and mobile apps by testing them across an extensive range of desktop browsers and real mobile devices.

services.name: AWS Fault Injection Simulator
services.documentation: AWS Fault Injection Simulator is a fully managed service for running fault injection experiments on AWS that makes it easier to improve an application's performance, observability, and resiliency.

services.name: AWS Chatbot
services.documentation: AWS Chatbot is an interactive agent that makes it easy to monitor and interact with your AWS resources in your Slack channels and Amazon Chime chat rooms.

services.name: AWS License Manager
services.documentation: AWS License Manager makes it easier to manage your software licenses from software vendors such as Microsoft, SAP, Oracle, and IBM across AWS and on-premises environments.
services.costHint: No charge for AWS License Manager

services.name: AWS Service Catalog
services.documentation: AWS Service Catalog allows organizations to create and manage catalogs of IT services that are approved for use on AWS.
services.costHint: No charge for AWS Service Catalog

services.name: AWS OpsWorks
services.documentation: AWS OpsWorks is a configuration management service that provides managed instances of Chef and Puppet.

services.name: AWS Elastic Beanstalk
services.documentation: AWS Elastic Beanstalk is an easy-to-use service for deploying and scaling web applications and services.

services.name: AWS App Runner
services.documentation: AWS App Runner is a fully managed service that makes it easy for developers to quickly deploy containerized web applications and APIs.

services.name: AWS Wavelength
services.documentation: AWS Wavelength embeds AWS compute and storage services within 5G networks, providing mobile edge computing infrastructure.

services.name: AWS Local Zones
services.documentation: AWS Local Zones place compute, storage, database, and other select AWS services closer to end-users.

services.name: AWS Snow Family
services.documentation: The AWS Snow Family is a collection of physical devices that help migrate large amounts of data into and out of the cloud.

services.name: AWS Snowcone
services.documentation: AWS Snowcone is the smallest member of the AWS Snow Family of edge computing and data transfer devices.

services.name: AWS Snowmobile
services.documentation: AWS Snowmobile is an exabyte-scale data transfer service used to move extremely large amounts of data to AWS.

services.name: AWS Marketplace
services.documentation: AWS Marketplace is a digital catalog with thousands of software listings from independent software vendors.

services.name: AWS Partner Central
services.documentation: AWS Partner Central provides AWS Partners with the resources they need to build a successful business on AWS.

services.name: AWS IQ
services.documentation: AWS IQ enables customers to quickly find, engage, and pay AWS Certified third-party experts for on-demand project work.

services.name: AWS re:Post
services.documentation: AWS re:Post is a cloud knowledge service where customers can get answers to their technical questions about AWS from the community and AWS experts.

services.name: AWS Training and Certification
services.documentation: AWS Training and Certification helps you build and validate your cloud skills so you can get more out of the cloud.

services.name: AWS Activate
services.documentation: AWS Activate provides startups with the low-cost, easy-to-use infrastructure needed to scale and grow.

services.name: AWS Educate
services.documentation: AWS Educate provides students and educators with the resources needed to greatly accelerate cloud-related learning.

services.name: AWS Credits
services.documentation: AWS Credits are promotional credits that can be applied to your AWS bill to help cover costs for eligible services.

services.name: AWS Personal Health Dashboard
services.documentation: AWS Personal Health Dashboard provides alerts and remediation guidance when AWS is experiencing events that may impact you.
services.costHint: No charge for Personal Health Dashboard

services.name: AWS Compute Optimizer
services.documentation: AWS Compute Optimizer recommends optimal AWS resources for your workloads to reduce costs and improve performance.

services.name: AWS Resource Groups
services.documentation: AWS Resource Groups lets you organize AWS resources that are related to an application or project.

services.name: AWS Tag Editor
services.documentation: AWS Tag Editor provides a central, unified way to create and manage your tags across AWS services and resources.

services.name: AWS Application Composer
services.documentation: AWS Application Composer is a visual designer that you can use to build your serverless applications from multiple AWS services.

services.name: AWS SAM
services.documentation: The AWS Serverless Application Model (SAM) is an open-source framework for building serverless applications.

services.name: AWS CDK
services.documentation: The AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) is an open source software development framework to define your cloud application resources using familiar programming languages.

services.name: AWS Copilot
services.documentation: AWS Copilot is a command line interface (CLI) that enables customers to quickly launch and easily manage containerized applications on AWS.

services.name: AWS CLI
services.documentation: The AWS Command Line Interface (CLI) is a unified tool to manage your AWS services from the command line.

services.name: AWS SDKs
services.documentation: AWS SDKs provide convenient ways to create access to AWS services from a variety of programming languages.

services.name: AWS Tools for PowerShell
services.documentation: The AWS Tools for PowerShell are a set of PowerShell cmdlets to help you manage your AWS services from the PowerShell command line.

services.name: AWS Console Mobile App
services.documentation: The AWS Console Mobile Application, provided by Amazon Web Services, lets you view and manage a select set of resources to support incident response while on-the-go.

patterns.label: Serverless REST API with Database
patterns.summary: Build a scalable REST API without managing servers. Perfect for web and mobile backends with automatic scaling.
patterns.costSummary: Very low cost for low-medium traffic. Pay only for actual usage.
securityNotes: Use IAM roles for Lambda, never hardcode credentials
Enable API Gateway authorization with Cognito or API keys
Enable DynamoDB encryption at rest

patterns.label: Full-Stack Web Application
patterns.summary: Complete web application with authentication, API, and database.

patterns.label: Data Lake and Analytics
patterns.summary: Comprehensive data lake solution for analytics and BI.

patterns.label: IoT Data Processing Pipeline
patterns.summary: Real-time IoT data ingestion and visualization.

patterns.label: E-commerce Platform
patterns.summary: Complete e-commerce solution with payment processing.

patterns.label: Content Management System
patterns.summary: Headless CMS for content creation and management.

patterns.label: Video Streaming Platform
patterns.summary: Scalable video streaming with global delivery.

patterns.label: Backup and Disaster Recovery
patterns.summary: Automated backup and disaster recovery solution.

patterns.label: Mobile App Backend
patterns.summary: Complete mobile app backend with sync.

patterns.label: Social Media Platform
patterns.summary: Social media platform with user feeds.

patterns.label: Weather Data Service
patterns.summary: Weather data aggregation and API service.

patterns.label: File Sharing Platform
patterns.summary: Secure file sharing with access control.

patterns.label: Survey and Forms Platform
patterns.summary: Dynamic survey creation and response collection.

patterns.label: Customer Relationship Management
patterns.summary: Complete CRM with lead tracking and email.

patterns.label: QR Code Generator Service
patterns.summary: Dynamic QR code generation and tracking.

patterns.label: Podcast Hosting Platform
patterns.summary: Podcast hosting with RSS feed generation.

patterns.label: Static Website Hosting
patterns.summary: Host a fast, secure static website with global CDN distribution. Ideal for portfolios, landing pages, and SPAs.
patterns.costSummary: Extremely low cost. Often under $1/month for small sites.
securityNotes: Enable HTTPS via CloudFront SSL certificate
Block public S3 access, use CloudFront OAI
Consider WAF for DDoS protection

patterns.label: ML Model Deployment with Frontend
patterns.summary: Deploy machine learning models with a web frontend for real-time predictions. Complete ML application stack.
patterns.costSummary: Medium cost due to SageMaker endpoints. Consider serverless inference for lower costs.
securityNotes: Use IAM roles for SageMaker access
Enable API Gateway authentication
Encrypt model artifacts in S3
Use VPC endpoints for private communication

patterns.label: AI Image Analysis Pipeline
patterns.summary: Automatically analyze images using AI for object detection, facial analysis, and content moderation.
patterns.costSummary: Pay per image analyzed. Cost-effective for moderate volumes.
securityNotes: Use IAM roles with least privilege for Rekognition access
Encrypt S3 bucket with SSE-S3 or SSE-KMS
Consider data privacy regulations for facial data

patterns.label: Real-time Notifications System
patterns.summary: Send real-time notifications via SMS, email, or push. Perfect for alerts, updates, and user engagement.
patterns.costSummary: Very low cost. SMS charges vary by country.
securityNotes: Use SNS topic policies to restrict publishers
Enable encryption for SQS queues
Validate message content before processing

patterns.label: Batch Data Processing
patterns.summary: Process large datasets in parallel using managed batch computing.
patterns.costSummary: Pay only for compute resources used during job execution.
securityNotes: Use IAM roles for job execution
Encrypt data at rest and in transit
Monitor job execution with CloudWatch

patterns.label: Data Analytics Pipeline
patterns.summary: Ingest, process, and analyze streaming data. Build dashboards and run SQL queries on your data lake.
patterns.costSummary: Costs scale with data volume. Athena charges per query.
securityNotes: Encrypt data at rest in S3 and Kinesis
Use IAM policies to control Athena query access
Enable CloudTrail for audit logging

patterns.label: Simple Website Hosting
patterns.summary: Quick and easy website hosting for small projects and blogs.
securityNotes: Enable automatic backups
Use HTTPS certificates
Keep software updated

patterns.label: Containerized Application
patterns.summary: Deploy containerized applications with automatic scaling. Great for microservices architecture.
patterns.costSummary: Pay for compute resources. Fargate simplifies pricing.
securityNotes: Scan container images for vulnerabilities
Use task IAM roles, not instance roles
Enable VPC networking for isolation

patterns.label: Generative AI Chatbot
patterns.summary: Build an AI-powered chatbot using foundation models. Create conversational experiences with generative AI.
patterns.costSummary: Pay per token processed. Costs vary by model.
securityNotes: Implement input validation to prevent prompt injection
Use IAM to restrict Bedrock model access
Consider content filtering for responses

patterns.label: User Authentication System
patterns.summary: Implement secure user authentication with social login support. Manage users without building auth from scratch.
patterns.costSummary: Free for first 50K users. Very cost-effective.
securityNotes: Enable MFA for sensitive applications
Use secure password policies
Implement proper token validation

trendingTopics.label: Generative AI & ML
trendingTopics.description: Build intelligent applications with foundation models, image recognition, and natural language processing.

trendingTopics.label: Serverless First
trendingTopics.description: Build and run applications without managing servers. Pay only for what you use.

trendingTopics.label: Containers & Kubernetes
trendingTopics.description: Package and deploy applications consistently using Docker containers and orchestration.

trendingTopics.label: Real-Time Streaming
trendingTopics.description: Process and analyze data in real-time for instant insights and actions.

trendingTopics.label: Data Lake & Analytics
trendingTopics.description: Store, process, and analyze massive amounts of data for business intelligence.

trendingTopics.label: Zero Trust Security
trendingTopics.description: Implement modern security practices with identity-based access control.

trendingTopics.label: Edge & CDN
trendingTopics.description: Deliver content and compute at the edge for low latency global performance.

trendingTopics.label: IoT Workloads
trendingTopics.description: Connect, manage, and process data from Internet of Things devices.
